instructions.name: admin_set_creator
docs: Allows Global::admin_set_creator_authority to override the bonding curve creator

instructions.name: buy
docs: Buys tokens from a bonding curve.

instructions.name: buy_exact_sol_in
docs: Given a budget of spendable SOL, buy at least min_tokens_out tokens.
Fees are deducted from spendable_sol_in.
# Quote formulas
Where:
- total_fee_bps = protocol_fee_bps + creator_fee_bps (creator_fee_bps is 0 if no creator)
- floor(a/b) = a / b (integer division)
- ceil(a/b) = (a + b - 1) / b
SOL → tokens quote
To calculate tokens_out for a given spendable_sol_in:
1. net_sol = floor(spendable_sol_in * 10_000 / (10_000 + total_fee_bps))
2. fees = ceil(net_sol * protocol_fee_bps / 10_000) + ceil(net_sol * creator_fee_bps / 10_000) (creator_fee_bps is 0 if no creator)
3. if net_sol + fees > spendable_sol_in: net_sol = net_sol - (net_sol + fees - spendable_sol_in)
4. tokens_out = floor((net_sol - 1) * virtual_token_reserves / (virtual_sol_reserves + net_sol - 1))
Reverse quote (tokens → SOL)
To calculate spendable_sol_in for a desired number of tokens:
1. net_sol = ceil(tokens * virtual_sol_reserves / (virtual_token_reserves - tokens)) + 1
2. spendable_sol_in = ceil(net_sol * (10_000 + total_fee_bps) / 10_000)
Rent
Separately make sure the instruction's payer has enough SOL to cover rent for:
- creator_vault: rent.minimum_balance(0)
- user_volume_accumulator: rent.minimum_balance(UserVolumeAccumulator::LEN)

instructions.name: collect_creator_fee
docs: Collects creator_fee from creator_vault to the coin creator account

instructions.name: create
docs: Creates a new coin and bonding curve.

instructions.name: create_v2
docs: Creates a new spl-22 coin and bonding curve.

instructions.name: distribute_creator_fees
docs: Distributes creator fees to shareholders based on their share percentages
The creator vault needs to have at least the minimum distributable amount to distribute fees
This can be checked with the get_minimum_distributable_fee instruction

instructions.name: extend_account
docs: Extends the size of program-owned accounts

instructions.name: get_minimum_distributable_fee
docs: Permissionless instruction to check the minimum required fees for distribution
Returns the minimum required balance from the creator_vault and whether distribution can proceed

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Creates the global state.

instructions.name: migrate
docs: Migrates liquidity to pump_amm if the bonding curve is complete

instructions.name: sell
docs: Sells tokens into a bonding curve.

instructions.name: set_creator
docs: Allows Global::set_creator_authority to set the bonding curve creator from Metaplex metadata or input argument

instructions.name: set_metaplex_creator
docs: Syncs the bonding curve creator with the Metaplex metadata creator if it exists

instructions.name: set_params
docs: Sets the global state parameters.

types.name: TradeEvent
docs: ix_name: "buy" | "sell" | "buy_exact_sol_in"

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.msg: The given account is not authorized to execute this instruction.

errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: The program is already initialized.

errors.name: TooMuchSolRequired
errors.msg: slippage: Too much SOL required to buy the given amount of tokens.

errors.name: TooLittleSolReceived
errors.msg: slippage: Too little SOL received to sell the given amount of tokens.

errors.name: MintDoesNotMatchBondingCurve
errors.msg: The mint does not match the bonding curve.

errors.name: BondingCurveComplete
errors.msg: The bonding curve has completed and liquidity migrated to raydium.

errors.name: BondingCurveNotComplete
errors.msg: The bonding curve has not completed.

errors.name: NotInitialized
errors.msg: The program is not initialized.

errors.name: WithdrawTooFrequent
errors.msg: Withdraw too frequent

errors.name: NewSizeShouldBeGreaterThanCurrentSize
errors.msg: new_size should be > current_size

errors.name: AccountTypeNotSupported
errors.msg: Account type not supported

errors.name: InitialRealTokenReservesShouldBeLessThanTokenTotalSupply
errors.msg: initial_real_token_reserves should be less than token_total_supply

errors.name: InitialVirtualTokenReservesShouldBeGreaterThanInitialRealTokenReserves
errors.msg: initial_virtual_token_reserves should be greater than initial_real_token_reserves

errors.name: FeeBasisPointsGreaterThanMaximum
errors.msg: fee_basis_points greater than maximum

errors.name: AllZerosWithdrawAuthority
errors.msg: Withdraw authority cannot be set to System Program ID

errors.name: PoolMigrationFeeShouldBeLessThanFinalRealSolReserves
errors.msg: pool_migration_fee should be less than final_real_sol_reserves

errors.name: PoolMigrationFeeShouldBeGreaterThanCreatorFeePlusMaxMigrateFees
errors.msg: pool_migration_fee should be greater than creator_fee + MAX_MIGRATE_FEES

errors.name: DisabledWithdraw
errors.msg: Migrate instruction is disabled

errors.name: DisabledMigrate
errors.msg: Migrate instruction is disabled

errors.name: InvalidCreator
errors.msg: Invalid creator pubkey

errors.name: BuyZeroAmount
errors.msg: Buy zero amount

errors.name: NotEnoughTokensToBuy
errors.msg: Not enough tokens to buy

errors.name: SellZeroAmount
errors.msg: Sell zero amount

errors.name: NotEnoughTokensToSell
errors.msg: Not enough tokens to sell

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Overflow

errors.name: Truncation
errors.msg: Truncation

errors.name: DivisionByZero
errors.msg: Division by zero

errors.name: NotEnoughRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: Not enough remaining accounts

errors.name: AllFeeRecipientsShouldBeNonZero
errors.msg: All fee recipients should be non-zero

errors.name: UnsortedNotUniqueFeeRecipients
errors.msg: Unsorted or not unique fee recipients

errors.name: CreatorShouldNotBeZero
errors.msg: Creator should not be zero

errors.name: BuyNotEnoughSolToCoverRent
errors.msg: Buy: Not enough SOL to cover for rent exemption.

errors.name: BuyNotEnoughSolToCoverFees
errors.msg: Buy: Not enough SOL to cover for fees.

errors.name: BuySlippageBelowMinTokensOut
errors.msg: Slippage: Would buy less tokens than expected min_tokens_out

errors.name: CreatorMigratedToSharingConfig
errors.msg: creator has been migrated to sharing config, use pump_fees::reset_fee_sharing_config instead

errors.name: UnableToDistributeCreatorVaultMigratedToSharingConfig
errors.msg: creator_vault has been migrated to sharing config, use pump:distribute_creator_fees instead

errors.name: SharingConfigNotActive
errors.msg: Sharing config is not active

errors.name: UnableToDistributeCreatorFeesToExecutableRecipient
errors.msg: The recipient account is executable, so it cannot receive lamports, remove it from the team first

errors.name: BondingCurveAndSharingConfigCreatorMismatch
errors.msg: Bonding curve creator does not match sharing config

errors.name: ShareholdersAndRemainingAccountsMismatch
errors.msg: Remaining accounts do not match shareholders, make sure to pass exactly the same pubkeys in the same order

errors.name: InvalidShareBps
errors.msg: Share bps must be greater than 0
